childrenExerciseStretching.title: Neck Flexion and Extension
childrenExerciseStretching.description: 3 x 10-15 sec each. Maintain good posture.

childrenExerciseStretching.title: Neck Lateral Flexion
childrenExerciseStretching.description: 3 x 10-15 sec each. Maintain good posture and keep shoulders down. Place opposite hand behind back to increase the stretch.

childrenExerciseStretching.title: Levator Scapula Stretch
childrenExerciseStretching.description: 3 x 10-15 sec each. Turn head 45 degrees, look down, then bring closer arm over the skull and pull down. Place opposite hand behind back to increase the stretch.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Neck 4-Way
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 10-15 sec or 10-12 each. Perform isometrically or isotonically with a resistance band. Neck extension, flexion and lateral flexion.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Chin Tuck
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 10-15 sec. Maintain good posture. Should feel stretch in back of neck and neck flexors.

childrenExerciseStrengthening.title: Rows
childrenExerciseStrengthening.description: 3 x 10-15 each. Perform with resistance band tied to a stationary object, or bent over with backpack or dumbbell. Maintain good posture.
